title: Joachim von Ribbentrop
summary: Joachim von Ribbentrop (30 April 1893 â€“ 16 October 1946) was a German politician who served as Minister of Foreign Affairs of Nazi Germany from 1938 to 1945. A high-ranking member of the Third Reich who survived the war before being executed for his crimes, Ribbentrop is considered the most powerful Nazi to have been brought to justice.
